citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00PM on 3-Feb-
2021. A person at the facility said the licensee would be gone for the day. We discussed optimal hours for inspections.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00PM on 3-Feb-
2021.  A person at the facility said the licensee would be gone for the day.  We discussed optimal hours for inspections. 
 
 
 
End Section
